attributes.action: Make Maria Miller repay in full her unnecessary claimed expenses
attributes.additional_details: A weak apology and the dignity of being able to resign does not equate to the tax payer's thousands plundered unjustly by this elected individual. Prove to the public that MPs are not above the punishment fraud should entail, and, at the least, force Ms Miller to repay what she has stolen from the tax payer. A member of the public would have been arrested for such crimes.
